name: Murat Cemcir
summary:
Murat Cemcir. Actor: The Wild Pear Tree. Born on November 30, 1976, Murat Cemcir is a Turkish actor with Georgian descent. He acted in supporting roles at films such as Underground/Yeralti (2012) and Takva (2006). Notable TV series he acted in include Uskudar'a Giderken and Ramazan Guzeldir.

He later filmed Calgi Cengi with Ahmet Kural and they formed a duo that got compared to many other praised Turkish comedy duos. Calgi...
